name: Joe
quote: I love Pathways, I've been coming here years. I grew here as a person.

name: Lisa
quote: I think Pathways is an amazing programme which gives you an opportunity to upskill in different areas and provides loads of educational and emotional support.

name: James
quote: The staff are really friendly, very patient and great at helping you with your assignments and getting into college.

name: Aaron
quote: It's good to have a safe place to come to after getting out of jail, I like the routine and the different courses you can do.
